Description.NoNotificationStings: You haven't created any Notification Strings.
Description.createNotificationRestrictio: All text will be filtered. There is a character limit of {maxLength} for body text.
Description.NotificationsIncreaseEngagem: Customizing Notifications can increase player engagement in your experience. {linkStart}Learn more{linkEnd}
Description.createNotificationsLink: Reach out to users with push and in-app notifications. {linkStart}Learn more{linkEnd}
Common.Label: Label
Message.ArchiveFailure: Notification String could not be archived. Please try again.
Message.ArchiveFailureWithContent: {contentId} could not be archived. Please try again.
Message.NotificationContentCreateFailedG: Notification string could not be created. Please try again.
Message.NotificationContentCreateFailedI: "{invalidContent}" contains words blocked by the text filter.
Message.NotificationContentUpdateFailedG: Notification string could not be updated. Please try again.
Label.StopReceivingEmailNotifications: Would you like to stop receiving email notifications from Roblox?
Label.StopReceivingAllEmailNotifications: Stop all email notifications related to my creations
Label.SuccessfullyUnsubscribedToEventAnd: You have successfully unsubscribed to {eventType} in {eventSurface}
Description.createNotificationRestrictio: Note: All text will be filtered. Only invite notifications are customizable at this time.
Description.PlaceHolder.ExperienceName: Personalizing notifications with the {strongStart}experienceName{strongEnd} placeholder is required.
Description.PlaceHolder.DisplayName: Including the sender’s display name using the {strongStart}displayName{strongEnd} placeholder is optional.
Message.NotificationContentCreateFailedD: This experience already has a notification string with this name.
Label.Name: Name
Message.NotificationContentCreateFailedM: Notification string needs to contain {placeholder} placeholder.
Description.Placeholder.UsageLimit: Note: You can only use each placeholder once.
Description.PlaceHolder: Personalizing notifications with the {strongStartExpName}{strongStartExpName} placeholder is required. Including the sender’s display name using the {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} placeholder is optional.
Description.Placeholder.Instruction: {strongStartExpName}{strongEndExpName} is a placeholder that will insert your experience's name - using this placeholder is required. {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} is a placeholder that will insert the inviter's display name - using this placeholder is optional.
Description.Placeholder.Instruction1: {strongStartExpName}{strongEndExpName} is a placeholder that will insert your experience's name - using this placeholder is required.
Description.Placeholder.Instruction2: {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} is a placeholder that will insert the inviter's display name - using this placeholder is optional.
Message.NotificationContentCreateFailedT: "{placeholder}" can not be used more than once.
Description.Placeholder.InstructionPlaye: For {linkStart}Player Invite Prompts{linkEnd}, {strongStartExpName}{strongEndExpName} is required and {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} is optional. Additional custom placeholders are not supported. The notification's title will automatically include the inviter's name.
Description.Placeholder.InstructionExper: For {linkStart}Experience Notifications{linkEnd}, you can include {strongStartUserIdSuffix}{strongEndUserIdSuffix} as well as any other custom placeholders. The title will automatically be the Experience Name.
Description.Placeholder.ExamplePlayerInv: Example: {strongStartDisName}{strongEndDisName} is inviting you to join {strongStartExpName}{strongEndExpName}!
Description.Placeholder.ExampleExperienc: Example: {strongStartUserIdHighScore}{strongEndUserIdHighScore} beat your high score by {strongStartPoints}{strongEndPoints} points!
Placeholder.NotificationStringContentExp: You're {questsLeft} quests away from completing the daily challenge!
Description.createNotificationRestrictio: Note: All text will be filtered.
Label.StopReceivingEmailNotificationsV2:
Choose which types of emails you'd like to receive as a Creator on Roblox. You can further customize your Creator notifications in your {creatorHubSettingsLinkStart}Creator Hub Settings{creatorHubSettingsLinkEnd}.
To manage Player notifications, go to your {robloxAccountSettingsLinkStart}Roblox Account Settings{robloxAccountSettingsLinkEnd}.
Label.StopReceivingAllEmailNotifications: Unsubscribe from all optional emails related to my creations, including certain alerts and reports.
Description.PlaceHolder.ExampleExperienc: Example: You're {strongStartQuestsLeft}{strongEndQuestsLeft} quests away from completing the daily challenge!
Description.Placeholder.InstructionExper: For {linkStart}Experience Notifications{linkEnd}, you can include any custom placeholders, other than those that mention a specific user (displayName or other direct mentions are not supported). The title will automatically be the Experience Name.
Description.NotificationsPage: {promptLinkStart}Create{promptLinkEnd} experience notifications to engage with users. {analyticsLinkStart}Learn more{analyticsLinkEnd} about campaign level analytics.
Description.Table.CampaignAnalytics: Experience Notifications can only be delivered to 13+ users.
Tooltip.Table.CampaignAnalytics.Clicks: Number of users who have clicked on the notification to join your experience.
Tooltip.Table.CampaignAnalytics.Clickthr: Rate at which users are clicking on the notification.
Tooltip.Table.CampaignAnalytics.TurnoffR: Rate at which users are turning off notifications for your experience.
Tooltip.Table.CampaignAnalytics.Name: This is the identifier name for the notification string. It can be overridden by the “category” field in your API calls.
Tooltip.Table.CampaignAnalytics.Impressi: Number of users who have seen the notification.
Tooltip.Table.CampaignAnalytics.FirstImp: Date when first impression for the campaign was registered.
Tooltip.Table.CampaignAnalytics.DismissR: Rate at which users are dismissing notifications.
Tooltip.Table.CampaignAnalytics.OptedInU: Total number of users who opt-in to your experience notifications. Please note 13+ users are eligible to receive all notifications, while users below 13 can only receive Experience Updates.
